mapper.select: select r.id, r.name, r.description, r.status, r.domain_id, r.role_code_id, rc.code role_code, rp.permission_id from role r join role_code rc on r.role_code_id = rc.id join domain d on r.domain_id = d.id left join role_permission rp on rp.role_id = r.id left join permission p on p.id = rp.permission_id where r.status = 0 and d.status = 0 and r.domain_id = #{domainId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select
from role r where r.status = 0 and r.domain_id = #{domainId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and ( exists ( select ur.role_id from user_role ur where r.id = ur.role_id and ur.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} ) or exists ( select gr.role_id from grp_role gr where gr.grp_id in( select gp.ancestor from grp_path gp, grp g, user_grp ug where gp.descendant = g.id and g.status = 0 and g.id = ug.grp_id and ug.type = 0 and ug.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} ) and r.id = gr.role_id ) )
